main.title: Settings
sound_test_on: Sound effects are enabled, you should have heard a sound. If you did not, then please check your computer's speakers.
sound_test_off: Sound effects are disabled, so no sound.
encrypt_validation_noPasswordDecrypt: No password entered, cannot decrypt wallet without a password.
encrypt_validation_decryptSuccess: Wallet was decrypted. No passphase is needed anymore.
encrypt_validation_noPasswordEncrypt: No valid password entered, cannot encrypt wallet without a valid password.
encrypt_validation_encryptSuccess: Wallet was encrypted. You will need the passphrase to unlock it. Any previous backup file remains unchanged - if it was unencrypted then it remains unencrypted
encrypt_clearPasswordConfirm: Do you want to clear the password? This will lock the wallet and require you to re-enter it prior to unlocking.
